name: Purple Frogs
description:
Small 2D game for the game jam of the 16th of may 2022 made with Unity on a Mac.

The theme is Frogs.

The limitation is limited time.

In this game you have to find your frog partner before its too late or stay single forever.  Jumping in water will slow you down. 

- Use WASD to move.

- Use WASD with SPACE to jump
